languages.text: "Он прав, Джай. Слову закона надлежит следовать каждому из нас".

traits.locale_text: "Он прав, Джай. Слову закона надлежит следовать каждому из нас".

languages.text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."
languages.original_text: "Он прав, Джай. Слову закона надлежит следовать каждому из нас".

traits.locale_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."
"He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."
"He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."
"He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

languages.text: “他说得没错，婕伊。我们每个人都必须遵守律法。”
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: “他说得没错，婕伊。我们每个人都必须遵守律法。”

languages.text: «Tiene razón, Jae. Debemos seguir la ley al pie de la letra».
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, Jae. Debemos seguir la ley al pie de la letra».

languages.text: 「ジェイ、アティリウスが正しいな。私たちひとりひとりが条文には従わなくてはならない」
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイ、アティリウスが正しいな。私たちひとりひとりが条文には従わなくてはならない」

languages.text: "Er hat recht, Jae. Wir alle müssen das Gesetz genau befolgen."
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat recht, Jae. Wir alle müssen das Gesetz genau befolgen."

languages.text: « Il a raison, Jae. Nous devons tous suivre la loi à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Il a raison, Jae. Nous devons tous suivre la loi à la lettre. »

languages.text: "Doğru söylüyor Jae. Kanunlara harfiyen uymamız gerek."
languages.original_text: "He is correct, Jae. Each of us must follow the letter of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru söylüyor Jae. Kanunlara harfiyen uymamız gerek."
